page.title: 11LAMBEG/CASTLEROBN.GOVERNMENT
page.content: At the time of our survey, an election for the{local council}was taking place.Most of this "d-block" lies in the{Lisburn Town}ward ,but the north and east are in the{Dunmurry Cross ward.The results returned a majority of Official and Democratic Unionist councillors and several Alliance councillors. The local issues which the different parties thought important included:_ { Job Creation and Rising Unemployment { Recreational Facilities { Training Schemes for the young { Reducing Rates increases { An Effective Local Economic Programme In Parliamentary Elections,the area is in the{South Antrim}constituency and for N.I.Assembly elections, the {Lagan Valley}constituency. {SEE **NOTE**
